ingredients.ingredient: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie

cookingTips: Toss fresh mulberries with sugar and flour to create a thickened filling without overwhelming the delicate fruit flavor
Use butter dotted over the filling to add richness without dense sauce
Brush top crust with milk and bake at 375°F for 45-50 minutes until golden, covering edges with foil if browning too quickly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you balance a light hand with thickening agents to showcase delicate mulberry flavor in a pie?
